data_table.description: Diagnostic Classification Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF1
variable.description: A. Status of Review. Q1. Dc Packet review status [Diagnostic Classification Form]
variable.value: Referred to full committee by adjudicator
Re-review after change in reviewer materials

variable.name: DCF2
variable.description: A. Status of Review. Q2. Was MRI information used for this review? [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF3
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q3. Reviewer's diagnosis [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF4
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q4. History of stroke [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF4A
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q4a. History of stroke. If yes, abrupt onset [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF5
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q5. Infarcts or extensive white matter disease on imaging: [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF6
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q6. Hachinski greater or equal to 4 [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF7
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q7. Parkinsonism on neurological exam [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF8
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q8. Visual hallucinations [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF9
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q9. REM sleep disorder [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF10
variable.description: C. Diagnostic Elements. Q10. Sleepy every day [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11A
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11a. Alzheimer's disease [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11B
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11b. Cerebrovascular disease [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11C
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11c. Lewy Body Disease [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11D
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11d. Other neurodegenerative disorder [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11E
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11e. Depression related cognitive impairment [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11F
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11f. Other psychiatric cognitive impairment [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11G
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11g. Alcohol related cognitive impairment [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11H
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11h. Medication related cognitive impairment [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11I
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11i. Systemic disease related cognitive impairment [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF11J
variable.description: D. Etiologic Diagnosis. Q11j. Head trauma related cognitive impairment [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [Diagnostic Classification Form]

variable.name: DCF1C
variable.description: A. Status of Review. Q1c. Did classifications change [Diagnostic Classification Form]
